programme.title: Harlequin
programme.desc: An ambitious Australian senator's son is cured of leukaemia by a faith healer, but he discovers that there is a high price to pay. The senator is overjoyed when his son is pronounced well, but then he learns that the mysterious healer has seduced his wife and is threatening to disrupt his political career.

programme.title: Wanted Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: This movie features a character who is supposed to be the descendant of the character played Steve McQueen in the television series of the same name. programme.title: Crack In the World
programme.desc: Dr. Steven Sorenson (Andrews) plans to tap the geothermal energy of the Earth's interior by means of a thermonuclear device detonated deep within the Earth. Despite dire warnings by fellow scientist Ted Rampian (Moore), Dr. Sorenson proceeds with the experiment after secretly learning that he is terminally ill. This experiment causes a crack to form and grow within the earth's crust, which threatens to split the earth in two if it is not stopped in time.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

credits.actor: Denzel Washington,John Goodman,Donald Sutherland,Embeth Davidtz,James Gandolfini,Elias Koteas,Gabriel Casseus,Michael J. Pagan,Robert Joy,Bill Clark

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

credits.actor: Hugh Grant,Marisa Tomei,Bella Heathcote,Allison Janney,J.K. Simmons,Chris Elliott,Aja Naomi King,Annie Q,Andrew Keenan-Bolger,Karen Pittman,Maggie Geha,Steven Kaplan

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

credits.actor: Brant Daugherty,Maiara Walsh,Cody Christian,Lauren Bowles,Alexandria Deberry,Nick Gomez,Theodus Crane,Trenton Rostedt,Eric Buarque,Joseph Aviel

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

credits.actor: Ensemble Cast

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

credits.actor: Michael Douglas,Diane Keaton,Sterling Jerins,Frances Sternhagen,Maurice Jones,Andy Karl,Austin Lysy,Annie Parisse,Scott Shepherd,Frankie Valli,Michael Terra,Sawyer Tanner Simpkins,Maxwell Simpkins,Luke Robertson,Meryl Williams,Rob Reiner

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

credits.actor: Mandira Bedi,Shibani Dandekar

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

credits.actor: Steve Carell,Toni Collette,Allison Janney,AnnaSophia Robb,Sam Rockwell,Maya Rudolph,Liam James,Rob Corddry,Amanda Peet,River Alexander,Zoe Levin,Nat Faxon,Jim Rash,Adam Riegler,Jeffery Ryan

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Greg Focker and his fiancee Pam decide to make their respective parents meet before their wedding. However, the Fockers' relaxed attitude does not go down well with Pam's family.

credits.actor: Robert De Niro,Ben Stiller,Dustin Hoffman,Barbra Streisand,Blythe Danner,Teri Polo,Tim Blake Nelson,Alanna Ubach,Ray Santiago,Kali Rocha,Shelley Berman,Owen Wilson,Spencer Pickren,Bradley Pickren

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: Tired of waiting for Mr. Right while her biological clock ticks away, Zoe (Jennifer Lopez) decides it's time to make an appointment at the sperm bank. On the same day as her procedure, she meets Stan (Alex O'Loughlin), a man with the potential to be her ideal mate. When Stan learns that Zoe's unpredictable behavior is the result of her pregnancy, he declares his commitment. As the due date approaches, both lovers realize that they really don't know each other without a baby in the picture.

credits.actor: Jennifer Lopez,Alex O'Loughlin,Michaela Watkins,Eric Christian Olsen,Anthony Anderson,Noureen DeWulf,Melissa McCarthy,Danneel Harris,Jennifer Elise Cox,Tom Bosley,Linda Lavin,Adam Rose

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An insecure airport security officers world shifts when a confident and beautiful woman shows interest in him, forcing him to confront self-doubt and social expectations.

credits.actor: Jay Baruchel,Alice Eve,T.J. Miller,Mike Vogel,Nate Torrence,Krysten Ritter,Geoff Stults,Lindsay Sloane,Debra Jo Rupp,Adam LeFevre,Kim Shaw,Sharon Maugham,Trevor Eve
